summary: This node allows you to read, update, and write data to Google Sheets.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the authentication method to use, either Service Account or OAuth2.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to work with, either Spreadsheet or Sheet.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the Google Sheet, such as Append, Clear, Create, Delete, Lookup, Read, Remove, or Update.

parameters.name: sheetId
parameters.description: The ID of the Google Spreadsheet where the operation will be performed.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: The table range to read from or to append data to in the Google Sheet.
